text: b"If you're a Groww user, find #GrowwDigest in your email inbox to read in-depth."

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 27 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 41st GST council meet held today
The total shortfall in GST collections is being estimated at Rs.2.35 lakh crore, said revenue secretary, Ajay Bhushan Pandey. Out of this, Rs 97,000 is due to the implementation of GST.

(5/5)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 27 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Around 15 Lakh people took COVID insurance in a month: Subhash C Khuntia, Chairman of IRDAI. IRDAI had launched two standard Coronavirus policies: Corona Kavach and Corona Rakshak.

(4/5)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 27 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 PM Modi announced that FDI in defense manufacturing through automatic route has been hiked to 74%. Earlier, FDI in defense manufacturing was 49%.

(3/5)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 27 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Government is planning to sell 15% of its stake in HAL Ltd. through an offer for sale. The offer opened today for non-retail investors and tomorrow for retail investors. The floor price is fixed at Rs.1,001 per share.

(2/5)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 27 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Sensex +0.10%, Nifty +0.08%

Top gainers: IndusInd Bank, Mahindra & Mahindra, State Bank of India
Top losers: ONGC, Bajaj Auto, Reliance Industries, Kotak Mahindra Bank

(1/5)'

b"@swacheks SEBI mandates that every broker shall once in a quarter, transfer any excess funds lying in the client's trading account back to his bank account. This was with the intention of ensuring that brokers don't misuse clients' idle funds."

b'@swacheks Hi,

Regarding the RAA-We would like to inform you that it is the retention statement.
It means, that in case if there are any non-utilized funds /shares in your trading account, the broker(Groww) is compulsorily required to credit these funds back to your bank account.'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 26 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Serum Institute of India starts Phase III trials in India for the vaccine developed by Oxford University. This vaccine is named \xe2\x80\x98Covishield\xe2\x80\x99.

#covishield

(4/4)'

b"#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 26 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Q1 results corner: Net profit for @GilletteIndia fell 2% to Rs.45 crore in the June-ended quarter. The company's sales were down 24% to Rs.351 crores during the same time frame.

(3/4)"

b"#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 26 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 @reliancejio adds 36.57 Lakh subscribers in May
Bharti Airtel and Vodafone Idea lost ~47 Lakh subscribers each. The number of telephone subscribers in India has decreased from 1,169.44 Mn (Apr '20) to 1,163.67 Mn (May '20).

(2/4)"

Top losers: Bharti Airtel, UltraTech Cement, Asian Paints, Maruti Suzuki

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 25 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 @airindiain bid deadline extended
The government has extended the deadline by 2 months till 30 October 2020. This is the fourth extension of the deadline since it began in January 2020.

(6/6)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 25 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Russia asks India to manufacture its vaccine, which it announced earlier this month.
\xe2\x80\xa2 The first documented case of COVID reinfection has emerged in Hong Kong.

(5/6)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 25 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 @TataMotors plans net zero debt in 3 years 
The company said they would do so by significantly deleveraging its business, reducing expenses, and curbing non-core investments. The company has a debt of around Rs.62,000 cr.

(4/6)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 25 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 S&P Global Ratings revised their outlook on @TCS from positive to stable. S&P is of the view that TCS may face slower growth in revenue and profitability over the next 12-18 months due to subdued global IT spending.

(3/6)'

b"#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 25 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Moody's Investors Service, a credit ratings firm, downgraded @TheOfficialSBI's standalone profile from Ba1 to Ba2 (non-investment grade ratings), and deposit ratings to Baa3, which is the last investment grade rating.

(2/6)"

\xe2\x80\xa2 Sensex +0.12%, Nifty +0.05%
Top gainers: Bajaj Finance, SBI, Tech Mahindra, Asian Paints
Top losers: NTPC, Sun Pharma, Nestle, Tata Steel

(1/6)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 21 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Yes Bank has sold Yes AMC to GPL Finance and Investments Ltd. That makes Prashant Khemka (ex-Goldman Fund Manager) the new owner of Yes AMC.

(5/5)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 21 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Gold slips for third consecutive day
The nearest gold futures on the MCX settled at Rs.52,151 per 10g at the end of today\xe2\x80\x99s session.

(4/5)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 21 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Government relaxes norms for claiming unemployment benefits. Workers can now claim 50% of the average wage, payable up to 90 days of joblessness, in addition to extending the scheme for a year (up to 30 June 2021).

(3/5)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 21 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Divi\xe2\x80\x99s Lab and SBI Life Insurance Co to enter Nifty 50 index from 25 Sep 2020, replacing Zee Entertainment and Bharti Infratel.

(2/5)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 20 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 @gmail, @googledrive servers down
Various users were unable to access the services earlier today as some of the company\xe2\x80\x99s servers were facing unexpected issues. As of 5PM IST, @Google says it has restored its services fully.

(6/6)'

b"#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 20 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Q1 results corner: Indian Overseas Bank 
The bank's net profit for the April-June quarter is Rs.121 crores as against a net loss of Rs.342.08 crores for the same quarter of the previous fiscal.

(5/6)"

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 20 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Fund raise: Vedanta has announced raising $1.4 billion through 3-year amortizing bonds with a coupon rate of 13% per annum. Vedanta will be using this money to delist itself from the exchanges.

(4/6)'

b'#GrowwDigest: Daily Highlights | 20 Aug 2020

\xe2\x80\xa2 Fund raise: L&T Finance Holdings is planning to raise Rs.200 crores, issued through 2,000 unsecured, redeemable, non-convertible debentures (NCDs) of face value of Rs.10 lakh at par.

(3/6)'

\xe2\x80\xa2 Fund raise: Mumbai-based private sector bank, @rblbank  is planning to raise around Rs.1,566 crores through the issue of 8.8 crore shares. The shares will be issued on a preferential basis.

(2/6)'
